page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We decided to look at employment in Hexham.And thought that our class would be a good example. In our class there are 37 children. 1 .59 parents of class 10 work. 2. 18 fathers work in Hexham. 18 fathers work elsewhere. 3. 17 mothers work elsewhere. 6 mothers work in Hexham. 4. In 9 cases both parents work in Hexham. {FATHERS }Those who work in Hexham work in various places in the town.Some fathers travel to Newcastle and some travel to other countries. {MOTHERS}most mothers who work,work in Hexham.Only 6 go elsewhere. In our opinion this is because Hexham is a small town and does not have a lot of jobs whereas Newcastle is a big town with lots of job opportunities.
